#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int LL;
#define getchar_unlocked getchar
#define f first
#define sc second
#define M 1000000007
int gcd(int a, int b) { return (b == 0 ? a : gcd(b, a % b)); }
int lcm(int a, int b) { return (a * (b / gcd(a, b))); }
inline int read()
{
	int ret = 0;
	int c = getchar_unlocked();

	while(c<'0' || c>'9')
		c = getchar_unlocked();
	while(c>='0' && c<='9')
	{
		ret = (ret<<3) + (ret<<1) + c - '0';
		c = getchar_unlocked();
	}
        return ret;
}
char str[100005];
int main()
{
    int t;
    t=read();
    while(t--){
    scanf("%s",str);
    int l=strlen(str);
    int m;
    m=read();
    int ans,cnt=0;
    for(int i=0;i<m;i++)
        if(str[i]=='A')
            cnt++;
    ans=cnt;
    for(int i=m;i<l;i++){
        if(str[i]=='A')
            cnt++;
        if(str[i-m]=='A')
            cnt--;
        ans=max(ans,cnt);
    }
    printf("%d\n",max(m-ans,0));
    }
    return 0;
}
